item.title: Off-duty corrections officer killed in 'targeted' attack: Police
item.description: An off-duty corrections officer in Florida was shot and killed in a “targeted attack,” according to police.

item.title: Trump says he could withhold aid from Jordan and Egypt if they reject his Gaza plan
item.description: It comes as Jordan's King Abdullah is set to visit the White House Tuesday.
